title: How to Get Ready for Cheerleading Tryouts

steps.title: This is crucial when trying to make the squad.
steps.content: This is crucial when trying to make the squad. If you don't practice, then you won't make the team.

steps.title: If you see any problems with any motions, do them until you can get them right.
steps.content: If you see any problems with any motions, do them until you can get them right.

steps.title: The judges will be impressed if you can do some tumbling moves.
steps.content: The judges will be impressed if you can do some tumbling moves. The key to that is to stretch and boost your flexibility.

steps.title: Try to break a sweat for at least one hour.
steps.content: Try to break a sweat for at least one hour.

steps.title: Visualize succeeding and seeing yourself through to the team.
steps.content: Visualize succeeding and seeing yourself through to the team. But if you feel nervous, say to yourself: "Hey, if I make it - wonderful! But if I don't make it, then that is OK because I can just try harder next year and I will already have experience."

steps.title: Make sure at tryouts you show the judges that you can at least do a little bit of tumbling:
steps.content: Make sure at tryouts you show the judges that you can at least do a little bit of tumbling:

steps.title: You need to be both physically and mentally ready.
steps.content: You need to be both physically and mentally ready. Psych yourself up with positive thoughts, positive self-talk and have a confident air. Don't start creating negative thoughts, focus on the good ones.

steps.title: Eat nutritious food up until your tryouts.
steps.content: Eat nutritious food up until your tryouts. Don't stop there, thoughâ€”be sure to eat healthily after tryouts as well.

steps.title: Reassure yourself that you are going to do your best and show your best.
steps.content: Reassure yourself that you are going to do your best and show your best. You have to be confident.

steps.title: The judges need to know if there is anything that might harm you.
steps.content: The judges need to know if there is anything that might harm you.

steps.title: These are the most important things that you have to remember.
steps.content: These are the most important things that you have to remember. Not all of the people who make the squad are the best cheerleaders in the world. The judges and coaches also choose their cheerleaders based on whether or not they have potential. If you smile, show confidence, be as friendly as possible, and show the judges that you are trying you hardest, they will see that you really care about making the team.
